availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Eddyville, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married Susan Jane Harris. Father of Nancy J. Harris, John R. Harris, Frances Harris, Thomas J. Harris, and K. Jane Harris. Farmer in Caldwell County, Kentucky in 1850. Farmer in Eddyville, Kentucky, in 1860.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 2, p. 374; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lyon County, p. 74; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lyon County, District 1, p. 32.
